title-group.article-title: Traveling Harlem's Europe: Vagabondage from Slave Narratives to Gwendolyn Bennett's "Wedding Day" and Claude McKay's "Banjo"

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 2001 JNT: Journal of Narrative Theory
